itemListElement.name: Vegan Methi Chicken Curry Recipe (Instant Pot) Soy Curls in Fenugreek Onion Sauce

@graph.name: Instant Pot Vegan Methi Chicken Curry with Creamy Fenugreek Onion Sauce
@graph.description: This Vegan Curry recipe with soy curls and creamy Fenugreek Onion Sauce makes for an amazing vegan version of Indian Methi Chicken.  Any easy Indian Instant Pot recipe that is gluten-free, nut-free & comes with a soy-free option.

video.name: VEGAN METHI CHICKEN CURRY (INSTANT POT) SOY CURLS IN FENUGREEK ONION SAUCE | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
VEGAN METHI CHICKEN CURRY 

FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-methi-chicken-curry-instant-pot/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

This curry with soy curls and creamy Fenugreek Onion Sauce makes for an amazing vegan version of Indian Methi Chicken.  gluten-free, nut-free, soy-free option.

******MORE INDIAN RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

INSTANT POT VEGAN BUTTER CHICKEN: https://www.veganricha.com/instant-pot-vegan-butter-chicken/

METHI MALAI PANEER TOFU: https://www.veganricha.com/methi-malai-paneer-tofu-fenugreek-greens-creamy-sauce/

VEGAN ‘PANEER’ PASANDA: https://www.veganricha.com/hemp-tofu-in-rich-creamy-gravy-vegan/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

Connect with me on Social Media:

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/VeganRicha

INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/veganricha

PINTEREST: https://www.pinterest.com/veganricha/

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/veganricha

Music: Epidemic Sound 

#veganricha #easyveganreecipes #methichicken #veganchikencurry #vegeanindian #indiancurries

recipeIngredient: 1 tsp oil (or use 2 tbsp broth for oil-free)
1  hot or mild green chile (, I use serrano)
1/2 tsp sugar or sweetener (or more to taste )
3/4 cup non-dairy milk (or more to preference , such as almond milk, cashew milk, soy milk, coconut milk or oat milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Start the Instant Pot on saute mode. Add the oil and wait for it to get hot. Add the whole spices and mix for a few seconds until fragrant, then add the minced onions and saute until translucent. (You can add in the garlic here if you don't want to blend the garlic with the tomato.)
recipeInstructions.name: Start the Instant Pot on saute mode. Add the oil and wait for it to get hot. Add the whole spices and mix for a few seconds until fragrant, then add the minced onions and saute until translucent. (You can add in the garlic here if you don't want to blend the garlic with the tomato.)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the tomato, tomato paste, garlic, ginger, chili with 3/4 cup water.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the tomato, tomato paste, garlic, ginger, chili with 3/4 cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ground spices and mix them in. Add tomato mixture to the IP and mix it in. Switch off saute mode.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ground spices and mix them in. Add tomato mixture to the IP and mix it in. Switch off saute mode.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dried soy curls, salt, sugar, dairy-free yogurt and mix in. Close the lid and pressure cook for 15 mins, natural release
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dried soy curls, salt, sugar, dairy-free yogurt and mix in. Close the lid and pressure cook for 15 mins, natural release

recipeInstructions.text: Open the lid and add the non-dairy milk and bring to a boil. Taste and adjust salt and flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Open the lid and add the non-dairy milk and bring to a boil. Taste and adjust salt and flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garam masala or ground coriander and fenugreek leaves and mix in. Switch off the saute mode at this point as you don't want to boil the fenugreek for too long to not lose the flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garam masala or ground coriander and fenugreek leaves and mix in. Switch off the saute mode at this point as you don't want to boil the fenugreek for too long to not lose the flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve garnished with cilantro, red pepper flakes, and some freshly cut lime wedges. Tastes best with rice or some naan flatbread.Store refrigerated for upto 3 days. Reheat with additional non dairy milk as the sauce will tend to dry out.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve garnished with cilantro, red pepper flakes, and some freshly cut lime wedges. Tastes best with rice or some naan flatbread.Store refrigerated for upto 3 days. Reheat with additional non dairy milk as the sauce will tend to dry out.

recipeInstructions.text: Saucepan: Blend the tomato, tomato paste, ginger, garlic, chili with 1/4 cup water. Follow steps 1,2,3 in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook the tomato mixture until thickened and slightly roasted. (7 to 10 mins).Add the soy curls, non dairy yogurt, salt and sugar and mix in. cook for 3 mins. Add in the non dairy milk and 3/4 cup water and continue too cook until the soy curls are tender.(7 to 10 mins). Add garam masala/ Taste and adjust.
recipeInstructions.name: Saucepan: Blend the tomato, tomato paste, ginger, garlic, chili with 1/4 cup water. Follow steps 1,2,3 in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook the tomato mixture until thickened and slightly roasted. (7 to 10 mins).Add the soy curls, non dairy yogurt, salt and sugar and mix in. cook for 3 mins. Add in the non dairy milk and 3/4 cup water and continue too cook until the soy curls are tender.(7 to 10 mins). Add garam masala/ Taste and adjust.
